mapper.insert: insert into hotspot_article (user_id, plan_id, attraction_id, upload_dir, img_name, img_path, hit, created_at) values (#{userId}, #{planId}, #{attractionId}, #{uploadDir}, #{imgName}, #{imgPath}, 0, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select ha.article_no as articleNo, ha.user_id as userId, ha.plan_id as planId, ha.attraction_id as attractionId, ha.upload_dir as uploadDir, ha.img_name as imgName, ha.img_path as imgPath, ha.created_at as createdAt FROM hotspot_article) a WHERE a.articleNo = #{articleNo}
mapper.delete: delete * FROM (ha.article_no as articleNo, ha.user_id as userId, ha.plan_id as planId, ha.attraction_id as attractionId, ha.img_path as imgPath ha.created_at as createdAt FROM hotspot_article) a WHERE a.articleNo = #{articleNo}
